body.name: ValentinA Latest Boys Thicken Fleece Hooded Jacket Warm Quilted Coat Outdoor Cool Cute Fashion for Winter Autumn Spring
features: Design: convenient button and zipper closures. It is easy for children to take on and take off with simple design. With fabric covering the top of the zip to cover up their neck and chin. With 2 side pockets for simple and easy storage.

This soft, cozy material offers a versatile, everyday style with a new, more active slim cut so as to achieve a more warm. It is a versatile, all-season piece with an impeccable fit built to keep kids warm in milder weather.
Great jacket for outdoor activities. Suitable for walking, running, playing, skiing, climbing, mountaineering, hiking, traveling, fishing, riding and also suit for taking it as daily wear.
body.description: Look this light & comfortable & fashion jacket for your kids! The top-level quality to guarantee the high efficient of windproof, breathable and lightweight. Whenever your kids go to hiking, skiing, fishing, skating, cycling and so on, your kids wear it and it will keep them all-around warm. Stand collar, full front zipper closure. This is for keeping a little one cozy and warm during the colder days. Keeping your kids warm outdoors in winter weather conditions, our jacket is a classic style jacket. It features a warm fleece inner teamed with a windproof outer layer, creating a highly functional winter combination. The fleece jacket can be slipped on easily over your functional base layer, as the sleeves are lined with soft fabric. The outer jacket is robust and guaranteed windproof. It is also breathable, making it very comfortable for winter activities. The heating liner is windproof, breathable, polyester touch light-weight thermal fleece lining, which keep your kids warm and comfortable. Specifically designed using stretchable and high quality fabric so that it lasts long and also allows easy and flexible body movements for any sport. So it is a perfect for your kids to enjoy their outdoor activities. Suitable occasion: Good for indoor outdoor usual school situation or sport exercise field on Winter, Autumn or Spring, best choice to show your fashion style. Suitable for indoor and outdoor exercise, running, riding, camping, cycling, rock climbing, picnic, city walking and other sports, providing your kids flexible wearing choices. This kids' jacket features long sleeves, lightweight, stretchy lightweight fabric for a comfortable fit, with a hood and snuggly lining to provide an extra warm layer. Cute jacket. Most wish and Best choice for your kids!

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #29,302 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #19 in Boys' Fleece Jackets & Coats

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit very warm
reviews.reviewText: For my son. Fit perfectly and kept him warm. Decently sturdy coat. Looks exactly like the picture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son picked this coat out he's 5 and years a size 6/7. It is good quality warm and thick and fits him perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice winter coat. Not too thick so that it’s hard to fit my son in his car seat. My only hold up with giving this 5 stars is the zipper. I had read some reviews mentioning it’s not easy to zip and I ended up with the same issue BUT the thickness of the coat was EXACTLY what I was looking for. My son can still move and play in this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son loves it
reviews.reviewText: My son needed a new winter coat. He’s a “ tween now” and wanted a “ cooler coat” like a big kid. This coat did the trick. He says it’s very warm without being too bulky and doesn’t feel like a baby in it, so I call that a win. Great price too and very good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son. Great Jacket. It is durable, nice material. Great color to help spot him. Runs smaller than I imagined even with looking at the sizing chart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We loved it!
reviews.reviewText: My son is 3 1/2 years old. He’s very tall for his age and I got this jacket size 5. It’s a little big long wise but arms length is good. It’s really warm and soft in the inside and I love the blue and green colors, zipper works fine for me, was worried after reading reviews but so far this jacket is perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice coat for an 8 year old boy who's favorite color is red. Seems warm and fit's him very well.Only one thing I can comment about, besides that is that the hood really needs to be larger. Make sure your kid has a hat too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed in myself!
reviews.reviewText: I did not pay close enough attention to the other reviews because I didn’t realize that the chest pocket is not actually a real pocket. Simply a zipper for aesthetic purposes and to be honest, I would have preferred it not be there at all. Additionally, the other pockets seem smaller than I think they should be. Otherwise, color is great, nice and thick, should be warm. I’m waiting on my son to get home to try it on and may be returning it. Not sure yet.
